title: Onions.. how can people enjoy them...
body:
https://ferrebeekeeper.files.wordpress.com/2015/03/9159669001405662336.jpg

My dad loves onions, I can barely stand to eat it..

Do you need to cook onions in a special way to make them taste better?

anyone here love to eat onions?

why? 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
